content.rendered:
Directed by Milind Rau.

Written by Chandan Arora. Rahul Ramchandani. Milind Rau. Siddharth.

Cast Prakash Belawadi(Father Joshua). Khushi Hajare(Sarah (as Khushi Hazare)). Andrea Jeremiah(Laxmi). Atul Kulkarni(Paul). Avinash Raghudevan(Psychic). Siddharth(Dr. Krish). Suresh(Dr. Prasad). Anisha Victor(Jenny).Manav Vij

Languages Telugu. Tamil. Hindi.

Producers Siddharth.

Production Etaki Entertainment. Viacom18 Motion Pictures.
